text: Hiralal Yadav (1925/1926 â€“ 12 May 2019) was an Indian folk singer. He was awarded the Padma Shri, the fourth highest civilian award in India in 2019. He was awarded the Yash Bharti Award in 2015. He was born in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. He was best known for his works with T-Series. Yadav died on 12 May 2019, at a hospital in Varanasi at the age of 93.Padma Shri Awardee Bhojpuri singer Hiralal Yadav passes away at 93 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Heera Lal Yadav's Discography Category:1920s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Indian singers Category:Indian musicians Category:People from Uttar Pradesh
title: Hiralal Yadav
